author: Source: Greenwich Citizen
title: 'They'd love to do damage': The FBI says ISIS wants to hack parts of the US p... - Greenwich Citizen
text:
ISIS hackers are attempting to penetrate the US energy grid in order to carry out cyber attacks and down parts of the country's energy supply, CNN Money reports. Law enforcement officials shared the information about attempted ISIS cyber attacks at a conference on October 14 with American energy firms about potential national security issues.
 Greenwich Citizen.
